episodes.title: Narcissistic Abuse as a Cult of One: Mind Control, Exit Strategies & Healing | with Vanessa Reiser
episodes.description:
Join Dr. Nadine Macaluso and trauma therapist Vanessa Reiser, LCSW, for a powerful conversation on narcissistic abuse, cult dynamics, and escaping toxic relationships!

In this eye-opening episode of SURTHRIVER Conversations, Vanessa breaks down how narcissistic relationships function as a "cult of one" and reveals the mind control tactics that keep survivors trapped.

What You'll Learn:
✅ Why narcissistic abuse is essentially a cult of one 
✅ The calling cards of a narcissist—and how to spot them early 
✅ How passive aggression is "microdosing antagonism" 
✅ Why the smear campaign starts LONG before you leave 
✅ The shocking truth about the discard phase (and why it hurts so much) 
✅ Punishment for autonomy—what narcissists really can't stand 
✅ How to create a strategic exit plan (and why you should NEVER tell them you're leaving)
✅ The importance of finding the right attorney and therapist 
✅ Why healing leads to self-actualization and reclaiming your identity

Want more from Vanessa Reiser? 📖 Grab her book: Narcissistic Abuse: A Therapist's Guide to Identifying, Escaping, and Healing from Toxic and Manipulative People 🌐 Find Vanessa and connect with her work

Follow Dr. Nadine on Instagram: / @TheRealDrNadine e

📖 Get her book Run Like Hell: A Therapist's Guide to Recognizing, Escaping, and Healing from Trauma Bonds: https://drnae.com/run-like-hell-book/

Want more support? Join Dr. Nadine's SURTHRIVER COMMUNITY to connect with other women healing from trauma bonds, access expert content, and get direct support from Dr. Nadine: https://drnae.com/

💡 Did this resonate? Hit LIKE, SUBSCRIBE, and drop a comment below! Have you experienced the "cult of one" dynamic? What was your biggest takeaway?

#NarcissisticAbuse #CultOfOne #MindControl #ToxicRelationships #Healing #MentalHealth #ExitStrategy #SmearCampaign #DrNadine #VanessaReiser #TraumaBond #CoerciveControl #EmotionalAbuse #Recovery

▬ About Dr. Nadine Macaluso ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Dr. Nae is a licensed marriage and family therapist and somatic psychologist specializing in complex trauma, attachment, trauma bonds, and narcissism—informed by her personal experience as the former wife of Jordan Belfort (The Wolf of Wall Street).
